tasks.label: Commit Foundation (Phase 1)
tasks.command:
git commit -m 'feat: implement complete Phase 1 foundation with Redux, utilities, and theme

- Set up Redux store with game, session, and ui slices
- Implement core game logic utilities (cardUtils, gameLogic, strategyEngine)
- Create complete basic strategy charts data
- Configure MUI theme with blackjack-specific styling
- Build responsive layout structure with placeholder components
- Add TypeScript interfaces for all major state domains
- Establish component organization with proper exports'

tasks.label: Commit Core Game Logic (Phase 2)
tasks.command:
git commit -m 'feat: implement complete Phase 2 core game logic and automation

- Add comprehensive game flow thunks with dealer automation
- Implement all player actions (hit, stand, double, surrender)
- Create dealer turn logic following house rules
- Build hand resolution and outcome calculation system
- Enhance GameArea component with functional UI
- Add action logging for strategy analysis
- Implement proper game phase management
- Clean up code warnings and optimize imports
- Verify working development server with full game functionality'
